name: An Inevitable Race
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam.

I don't want to say much about the game, I'd like for it to speak for itself.  WASD/Arrow Keys/GamePad to move.  Can you discover the secret?

Developed with Unity, Garageband and Photoshop.

Notes: I wasn't sure I was going to be able to do LD this time.  I started feeling ill on Thursday and spent the weekend with a head cold that left me with brain fog and exhausted.  However, LD only comes around twice a year now, so I didn't want to miss the opportunity.  I managed a pretty simple game, but I tried to make it aesthetically pleasing.
